name: Sweet Nightmare (YemaBwoy, Morgan, Sh6pa)
description:
Every character has its own challenge! Embody MikeMoose, the Lich and Skelqing  to complete the level and defeat the final boss using all the characters!

Will you succeed?

This game has been developped using Unreal Engine 5 on Blueprints during 3 weeks.

The goal of this project was to discover the game engine and blueprint. Hope you enjoy!
